results.name: Theta series of cubic lattice with respect to square.
reference: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. 107.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
G. Nebe and N. J. A. Sloane, Home page for this lattice
mathematica: terms = 52; QP = QPochhammer; s = 4*(QP[q^2]^3*QP[q^4]^2)/QP[q]^2 + O[q]^terms; CoefficientList[s, q] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 05 2017 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
